copy.description: Hotels, restaurants, and tour operators use Clickeen to serve international customers in 29 languages instantly.
copy.title: FAQ examples - Clickeen

copy.headline: FAQ examples for hotels, restaurants, tour operators, and more
copy.subheadline: Give Ombra your website URL. Get your FAQ personalized to your business in 29 languages—instantly. No translator needed.

copy.headline: Hotels in Barcelona: guests from 50+ countries ask ‘check-in time?’ in 15 languages
copy.subheadline: Give Ombra your hotel website. FAQ personalized to your property in 29 languages—instantly. Reduce front desk inquiries by 60%, improve guest satisfaction scores.

copy.headline: Restaurants in Paris: tourists ask dietary questions in French, English, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese
copy.subheadline: Your menu FAQs in 29 languages—instantly. No translator, no manual work. Improve table turnover, reduce wait staff interruptions.

copy.headline: Airbnb hosts in Tuscany: check-in instructions, Wi‑Fi password, local tips in your guest's language
copy.subheadline: Give Ombra your listing URL. House rules in 29 languages instantly. 5-star reviews from international guests.

copy.headline: International customers don't wait for translations
copy.body: A hotel in Rome loses bookings when German tourists can't find check-in info. A restaurant in Tokyo loses reservations when English speakers can't find hours. Every unanswered question in their language is a lost customer. Ombra solves this: website URL → personalized FAQ in 29 languages, instantly.

copy.headline: Tour operators in Thailand: booking, safety, itinerary FAQs for international travelers
copy.subheadline: Give Ombra your tour website. FAQ in 29 languages instantly. Reduce email support by 70%, increase conversion from international markets.

copy.headline: Museums in Rome: exhibit info, tickets, hours for visitors from around the world
copy.subheadline: Visitor FAQs in 29 languages—instantly. Improve visitor experience, reduce information desk inquiries by 50%.

copy.title: From international confusion to instant clarity

items.title: Give Ombra your website URL
items.body: AI reads your business context—location, services, policies. Understands your specific needs automatically.

items.title: FAQ personalized to your business in 29 languages—instantly
items.body: No translator needed. No manual work. Content adapted to your business AND available globally, immediately.

items.title: Embed and watch international inquiries drop
items.body: 3-line script. Works anywhere. Guests, tourists, travelers get answers in their language before they ask.

items.title: Fast
items.body: Lightweight embeds and lazy loading. No layout jank.

items.title: Reliable
items.body: Deterministic contracts and build gates keep shipping safe at scale.

items.title: Accessible
items.body: Clear hierarchy, readable type, and interaction patterns that work across input methods.

copy.headline: Get your FAQ in 29 languages—instantly
